UniprotID	P09496-2
Accession	P09496;A8K4W3;B4DIN1;F5H6N3;Q2XPN5;Q53XZ1
EntryName	CLCA_HUMAN
ProteinName	Clathrin light chain A (Lca)
GeneName	CLTA
Length	218
Function	Clathrin is the major protein of the polyhedral coat of coated pits and vesicles. Acts as a component of the TACC3/ch-TOG/clathrin complex proposed to contribute to stabilization of kinetochore fibers of the mitotic spindle by acting as inter-microtubule bridge (PubMed:15858577, PubMed:21297582).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasmic vesicle membrane; Membrane; Coated pit; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Spindle
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar	
Charge
